title: Strengthening CS Practical Competencies: Workshop on Mathematical Instructional Design and Multimedia Production Skills

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level subject-matter expertise and problem-solving abilities
context.additional_context: Service/Customer Engagement Role-Specific Competency Development Program

learning_goals: Learners can analyze real math education cases to apply effective instructional strategies (case provision, interaction design) with over 80% accuracy.
Learners can select and design at least three multimedia tools and techniques (visualization, simulation) tailored to learner and content characteristics.
Learners can document collaboration processes with stakeholders and achieve over 90% progress using project management tools (e.g., Jira, Notion).
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
